pattern.name: Buffered Dataflow
pattern.problem: Factors such as CPU time and memory consumption influence the energy consumption at software runtime. Moving data (e.g. from memory to hard drive or via the network) is an activity that might consume a lot of energy. (See [1].)
pattern.solution: Often it is a good idea, to work with caches or buffers to keep the the data flow generally low.

literature.bibliomixed: Geiger et al. (2020): Ressourceneffiziente Programmierung. Berlin: Bitkom, S. 9.
